channel.title: 317 | Delta | Working Compiler | Tutorial For Beginners | Compiler Help |
channel.description:
_Welcome Moparscape. :) _Thanks For Reading, Today Im Going To Help All You Beginners With Your Compiler Problems For E.G:
_"System Cannot Find Path Specified"
_When You Changes The "Jdk1.6.0_23" ( For E.G ) To Your Version.
_I Have The Perfect Compiler Code For All You Beginners And If It Doesnt Work I Will Kill MySelf Because This Should Work For Ever And I Mean Every Single DeltaScape Server In The World.
_To Get You Compiler To Work Just Simply Click The Following Download Link: [url=http://uppit.com/rk8zaagf56fy/Beginner_DeltaScape_Compiler_By_BentonScape.rar]http://uppit.com/rk8zaagf56fy/Beginner_DeltaScape_Compiler_By_BentonScape.rar[/url]
_Dont Want To Download? Well Thats Fine Because I Can Still Help You! Copy And Paste The Following Code Into Your Compiler @ Edit.
[code]@Echo Off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/... :end echo Finished! pause exit[/code]
_Once Again Thanks For Reading And Please Read The Title! "Delta" So This DOESNT Work For Shard, Project Insanity, RuneSource And The Other Server Bases.
_Btw I Dont Use Delta No More So I Thought I Should Just Quickly Tell You Beginners My Compile Code That Hasent Failed Me Once In My History Of DeltaScape.
_Project Insanity For The Win.

item.title: 317 | Delta | Working Compiler | Tutorial For Beginners | Compiler Help |
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

Compiler i use, windows 7 32 bit

@echo off
if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
"%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

still confused why you posted this in the help section if this is a guide ?

Read full topic

item.description:
@BentonScape wrote:

_Welcome Moparscape.
_Thanks For Reading, Today Im Going To Help All You Beginners With Your Compiler Problems For E.G:

_“System Cannot Find Path Specified”

_When You Changes The “Jdk1.6.0_23” ( For E.G ) To Your Version.

_I Have The Perfect Compiler Code For All You Beginners And If It Doesnt Work I Will Kill MySelf Because This Should Work For Ever And I Mean Every Single DeltaScape Server In The World.

_To Get You Compiler To Work Just Simply Click The Following Download Link:
http://uppit.com/rk8zaagf56fy/Beginner_DeltaScape_Compiler_By_BentonScape.rar

_Dont Want To Download? Well Thats Fine Because I Can Still Help You! Copy And Paste The Following Code Into Your Compiler @ Edit.

@Echo Off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/... :end echo Finished! pause exit

_Once Again Thanks For Reading And Please Read The Title! “Delta” So This DOESNT Work For Shard, Project Insanity, RuneSource And The Other Server Bases.
